Text:
deathmetalmp3s: Well, it's cool that you share this movie with us, BUT: why the heck did you change the AVI-filename? Is the real filename just "Der.Todesking.1990.DVDRip.XviD.DualMP3.INC.EXTRAS-KamuiX.avi"? Just so I can change it back. I prefer releases unaltered :)

And also, the NFO says there are lots of extras included, like a "Making of"-featurette. Where are they?? Why didn't you include them? I'd love to see them!!

So my question is: is there ANY chance that you re-upload this release with all the original bonus material, with the original filenames of everything? That would be fantastic.

BTW: I'm also a Jรถrg Buttgereit fan :)
The audio don't work. I use VLC. I suck at figuring this out so can someone explaine what to do?

Dont waste your time on this. 
Bad quality, bad sound.
